metadata.description: UC dataset with coded IDs and pair-wise exclusions - FIXED VERSION
metadata.coverage: 13 scenarios representing 100% of defined use cases
changes: v2.1: Fixed all validation issues from v2.0
v2.1: Removed parent_scenarios from all specifications
v2.1: Fixed R12 orphaned requirement (now under S02)
v2.1: Removed invalid cross-requirement memory dependency from P01
v2.1: Standardized all protocol names to match form exactly

skipped_ids.note: These IDs are intentionally skipped and not missing

S01.name: Remote Solar Monitoring
S01.description: Solar/battery powered operation in remote locations with wireless communication
S01.conflict_reason: Low power incompatible with high-performance vision processing

S02.name: Utility-Scale Solar Farm
S02.description: Large-scale solar farm with centralized SCADA and distributed monitoring

S03.name: Batch Process Quality Control
S03.description: Regulated environment QC with audit trails and washdown requirements

S04.name: Basic Pass/Fail Inspection
S04.description: Simple vision-based inspection for presence/absence detection

S05.name: High-Speed Vision Inspection
S05.description: Advanced vision processing for high-speed production lines
S05.conflict_reason: High-performance vision incompatible with low power

S06.name: Multi-Protocol Gateway
S06.description: Protocol conversion between multiple industrial networks

S08.name: Remote Pump Station
S08.description: Low-power remote monitoring for pump stations

S09.name: Municipal Water Treatment
S09.description: Water/wastewater treatment plant control and monitoring

S10.name: Commercial Building Automation
S10.description: Building automation system with local HMI

S11.name: Campus-Wide Building Management
S11.description: Multi-building campus BMS with enterprise integration

S13.name: Production Line Control
S13.description: High-speed production line control with MES integration

R01.name: Entry-Level Computing
R01.description: Basic processing for simple control tasks

R04.name: Low Power Operation
R04.description: Battery or solar compatible power consumption

R05.name: Wireless Communication
R05.description: Cellular and radio connectivity for remote sites

R06.name: Extended Environmental
R06.description: Wide temperature range for outdoor installations

R11.name: Multi-Protocol Support
R11.description: Support for multiple industrial protocols simultaneously

R16.name: Industrial I/O
R16.description: Standard industrial analog and digital I/O

R18.name: Basic Vision Interface
R18.description: USB3 camera interface for basic inspection

R20.name: Redundant Power
R20.description: Dual power supply for high availability

R25.name: Real-Time Control Features
R25.description: Deterministic networking and low latency for industrial control

R26.name: Network Performance
R26.description: High-speed network connectivity for data-intensive applications

R28.name: Thermal Management
R28.description: Cooling requirements based on environment and power

R29.name: Environmental Resilience
R29.description: Vibration and shock protection for harsh environments

R31.name: Extended Wireless Options
R31.description: Multiple wireless connectivity options for IoT

P11.name: RAID Storage
P11.description: Redundant storage for data integrity with RAID configuration

P12.name: Under 20W Power
P12.description: Low power consumption for battery operation

P13.name: Redundant Power Supply
P13.description: Dual power inputs for high availability

P14.name: Extended Temperature
P14.description: Wide temperature range for outdoor installations

P15.name: Extreme Temperature
P15.description: Extreme temperature range for harsh environments

P18.name: IP65 Protection
P18.description: Complete dust protection and water jet resistance

P24.name: OPC UA Protocol
P24.description: OPC UA protocol for industrial connectivity

P45.name: 1 Gbps Ethernet Speed
P45.description: Gigabit ethernet for standard industrial applications

P46.name: 10 Gbps Ethernet Speed
P46.description: 10 Gigabit ethernet for high-speed data transfer

P49.name: IEEE 1588 PTP
P49.description: Precision Time Protocol for sub-microsecond synchronization

P60.name: Mobile/Vehicle Vibration Resistance
P60.description: Enhanced vibration resistance for mobile installations

P69.name: 8-Channel Digital I/O
P69.description: 8 digital I/O channels for basic control

P70.name: 8-Channel Analog I/O
P70.description: 8 analog input channels for basic measurements

P71.name: 32-Channel Analog I/O
P71.description: 32 analog channels for multi-point vibration monitoring

P72.name: 32-Channel Digital I/O
P72.description: 32 digital I/O for production line control

P73.name: DDR5 Memory
P73.description: Latest DDR5 memory for maximum performance

P74.name: NVMe Gen4 Storage
P74.description: Ultra-fast NVMe Gen4 storage for high-speed data

P78.name: 8 Network Ports
P78.description: 8 ethernet ports for complex multi-network setups

P79.name: Intel Xe Graphics
P79.description: Integrated Intel Xe graphics for basic GPU acceleration

P83.name: Ultra Low Power (<10W)
P83.description: Ultra low power consumption for battery/solar operation

C01.name: Stainless Steel Construction
C01.content: 316L stainless steel construction required for pharmaceutical washdown environments. Not available as standard form field option.

C02.name: HART Protocol
C02.content: HART protocol multiplexer support for smart field instruments. Requires specialized HART modem hardware not available in standard form options.

C03.name: SQL Database Integration
C03.content: SQL database connectivity for MES and enterprise systems. Requires middleware or custom application layer.

C04.name: REST API Support
C04.content: RESTful API for enterprise integration. Requires custom application development.

C05.name: FDA 21 CFR Part 11 Compliance
C05.content: System must support electronic signatures and audit trails for FDA compliance

C06.name: EPA Reporting Requirements
C06.content: Municipal water plants require EPA-compliant data formats

C07.name: Solar String Monitoring
C07.content: String combiner monitoring with 0.5% accuracy for MPPT optimization

C08.name: ISO 10816 Vibration Standards
C08.content: Vibration monitoring must comply with ISO 10816 standards
